title: Understanding the Purpose
text: Consider why the story within or insights from the data might be more impactful than individual facts.

title: Significance of Clarity
text: Think about how presenting data clearly could affect an audience's understanding or engagement. Does it makes sense to assume that the audience can arrive at insights simply from the raw data?

title: The Role of Perspective
text: Consider why stepping back from the data could provide a clearer view of its significance.
